comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I have started an entry for her here: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gladys_Buchanan_Unger She filled out two passport applications that give some biographical information. She studied in Paris and she lived in England since the 1890s because her parents worked there. It was in Paris that she adapted her fist work into English. Each application has a photo which matches the image here.
